scripts.postinstall: pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin mkdocs-include-markdown-plugin "mkdocs-material[imaging]"
scripts.build: mkdocs build && npx workbox generateSW workbox-config.js
scripts.start-pwa: npm run build && python3 -m http.server 8000 --directory site/
